name: Deeper and Deeper LD 48 - Self Care Game
name_original: Deeper and Deeper LD 48 - Self Care Game
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 48 in 7 hours by a single person. 

Theme: Deeper and Deeper

Complete various Activities to go deeper and deeper into a relaxed emotional and mental state. 
Level up for each activity you complete. 
Audio guides you through each activity.
